title: Flowcaster
tagline: Generate n8n workflows using natural language

form.promptLabel: Describe what you want to automate
form.placeholder: Example: Every morning at 9, fetch Bitcoin price and email it.
form.description: Use the form to turn natural language into deploy-ready n8n JSON.
form.mockToggle: Mock OpenAI call (useful without API key)

helper.mock: Running in mock mode (no OpenAI call).
helper.repair: Auto-repair was applied to produce valid JSON.

suggestions: Every morning at 8am fetch the day's weather and save it to Notion.
Listen for a new Farcaster cast mentioning Flowcaster, then post a GM reply.
When a new Shopify order contains VIP tag, DM me the details on Telegram.

librarySuggestion.title: We found a ready-made workflow that might match your request.
librarySuggestion.description: Use a vetted Flowcaster template or continue with a freshly generated one.

viewer.copyError: Could not copy JSON to clipboard.
viewer.unavailableBody: This workflow isn't accessible right now. Try generating a new one or re-running the migration.
viewer.copyDisabled: Copy disabled because workflow data is unavailable.
